info.name: BiblioHub
info.description:
# üìö BiblioHub ‚Äî Postman Collection Overview

> **Library Management System** | Spring Boot 3.5.6 | Java 21 | PostgreSQL | Port `9090` 
  

---

## Collection Information

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Base URL** | `http://localhost:9090` |
| **Framework** | Spring Boot 3.5.6 |
| **Java Version** | Java 21 |
| **Database** | PostgreSQL 5432 ‚Äî BiblioHub |
| **Total Endpoints** | 62 requests across 9 folders |
| **Authentication** | Spring Security ‚Äî Basic Auth (`mohamedMostafa`) |
| **Content-Type** | `application/json` |
| **Response Format** | Wrapped `ApiResponse` with `status`, `message`, `data`, `errors`, `timestamp` |

---

## HTTP Method Summary

| GET | POST | PUT | DELETE |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 26 requests | 18 requests | 8 requests | 10 requests |

---

## Standard Response Envelope

Every endpoint returns a consistent `ApiResponse` wrapper:

``` json
{
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Ok",
  "data": { },
  "errors": [],
  "timestamp": "12-02-2026 00:10:00"
}

 ```

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `status` | `Integer` | HTTP status code (200, 201, 400, 404, 409, 500) |
| `message` | `String` | Human-readable result summary |
| `data` | `T` | Response payload ‚Äî `null` on errors |
| `errors` | `List` | Validation/error messages ‚Äî empty on success |
| `timestamp` | `String` | Server timestamp ‚Äî format: `dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss` |

---

## HTTP Status Codes

| Code | Meaning |
| --- | --- |
| `200 OK` | GET / PUT ‚Äî resource retrieved or updated successfully |
| `201 Created` | POST ‚Äî resource(s) created successfully |
| `204 No Content` | DELETE ‚Äî resource deleted, no body returned |
| `400 Bad Request` | Validation failure ‚Äî field errors listed in `errors[]` |
| `404 Not Found` | Resource with given ID does not exist |
| `409 Conflict` | Duplicate resource ‚Äî unique constraint violated |
| `500 Internal Server Error` | Unexpected server-side error |

---

## Common Error Cases

| Scenario | Response |
| --- | --- |
| ID not found | `404` ‚Äî `" with id not found."` |
| Duplicate name / ISBN / email | `409` ‚Äî `" with = '' already exists."` |
| Missing required field | `400` ‚Äî `": "` |
| Invalid value (e.g. negative price) | `400` ‚Äî constraint message from validation annotation |

---

## Folders

---

### üìñ 1. Books

Manage the book catalog. Supports full CRUD plus bulk creation. Each book is linked to a publisher, category, and one or more authors.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/books` | Create a single book |
| `POST` | `/api/books/bulk` | Bulk create books |
| `GET` | `/api/books` | Retrieve all books |
| `GET` | `/api/books/{id}` | Retrieve book by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/books/{id}` | Update a book by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/books/{id}` | Delete a book by ID |

**Request Body Fields**

| Field | Type | Validation |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `bookTitle` | `String` | `@NotBlank` ‚Äî required |
| `bookISBN` | `String` | `@NotBlank` ‚Äî must be unique |
| `bookPrice` | `Double` | `@NotNull`, `@Positive` ‚Äî must be > 0 |
| `stockQuantity` | `Integer` | `@NotNull`, `@Min(0)` ‚Äî cannot be negative |
| `publisherId` | `Long` | FK ‚Äî must reference existing publisher |
| `categoryId` | `Long` | FK ‚Äî must reference existing category |
| `authorIds` | `List` | FK list ‚Äî must reference existing authors |

---

### ‚úçÔ∏è 2. Authors

Manage author records. Authors can be linked to multiple books via the book-author join table.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/authors` | Create a single author |
| `POST` | `/api/authors/bulk` | Bulk create authors |
| `GET` | `/api/authors` | Retrieve all authors |
| `GET` | `/api/authors/{id}` | Retrieve author by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/authors/{id}` | Update an author by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/authors/{id}` | Delete an author by ID |

---

### üè¢ 3. Publishers

Manage publisher records. Publisher names must be unique. Each publisher can have many books.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/publishers` | Create a single publisher |
| `POST` | `/api/publishers/bulk` | Bulk create publishers |
| `GET` | `/api/publishers` | Retrieve all publishers |
| `GET` | `/api/publishers/{id}` | Retrieve publisher by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/publishers/{id}` | Update a publisher by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/publishers/{id}` | Delete a publisher by ID |

---

### üìë 4. Categories

Organize books into named categories. Category names must be unique. Response includes a list of book titles in each category.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/categories` | Create a single category |
| `POST` | `/api/categories/bulk` | Bulk create categories |
| `GET` | `/api/categories` | Retrieve all categories |
| `GET` | `/api/categories/{id}` | Retrieve category by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/categories/{id}` | Update a category by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/categories/{id}` | Delete a category by ID |

---

### üë• 5. Customers

Manage customer accounts. Usernames must be unique. Passwords are accepted in requests but never returned in responses. Optionally links to a visitor record.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/customers` | Create a single customer |
| `POST` | `/api/customers/bulk` | Bulk create customers |
| `GET` | `/api/customers` | Retrieve all customers |
| `GET` | `/api/customers/{id}` | Retrieve customer by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/customers/{id}` | Update a customer by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/customers/{id}` | Delete a customer by ID |

---

### üõí 6. Orders

Create and manage customer orders. Each order is timestamped automatically and must include at least one order item. A convenience endpoint fetches all orders for a specific customer.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/orders` | Create a single order (with items) |
| `POST` | `/api/orders/bulk` | Bulk create orders |
| `GET` | `/api/orders` | Retrieve all orders |
| `GET` | `/api/orders/{id}` | Retrieve order by ID |
| `GET` | `/api/orders/customer/{customerId}` | Retrieve all orders for a customer |
| `PUT` | `/api/orders/{id}` | Update order (replaces all items) |
| `DELETE` | `/api/orders/{id}` | Delete order and its items |

---

### üìã 7. Order Items

Manage individual line items within an order. Each item references a book, a quantity, and a unit price at the time of ordering.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/orders/items` | Create a single order item |
| `POST` | `/api/orders/items/bulk` | Bulk create order items |
| `GET` | `/api/orders/items` | Retrieve all order items |
| `GET` | `/api/orders/items/{itemId}` | Retrieve order item by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/orders/items/{itemId}` | Update an order item by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/orders/items/{itemId}` | Delete an order item by ID |

---

### üîó 8. Book-Author Relationships

Manage the many-to-many join between books and authors. The relationship is enforced by a composite key `(bookId, authorId)`. Duplicate links are rejected. Query from either side.

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/book-authors` | Add one author to a book |
| `POST` | `/api/book-authors/bulk` | Bulk add book-author links |
| `GET` | `/api/book-authors/book/{bookId}` | Get all authors of a book |
| `GET` | `/api/book-authors/author/{authorId}` | Get all books by an author |
| `DELETE` | `/api/book-authors/{bookId}/{authorId}` | Remove an author from a book |

---

### üë§ 9. Visitors

Track anonymous site visitors by name and email. Visitor emails must be unique. A visitor can be optionally linked to a customer account (one-to-one).

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `POST` | `/api/visitors` | Create a single visitor |
| `POST` | `/api/visitors/bulk` | Bulk create visitors |
| `GET` | `/api/visitors` | Retrieve all visitors |
| `GET` | `/api/visitors/{id}` | Retrieve visitor by ID |
| `PUT` | `/api/visitors/{id}` | Update a visitor by ID |
| `DELETE` | `/api/visitors/{id}` | Delete a visitor by ID |

---

_BiblioHub ‚Äî Spring Boot 3.5.6 | Java 21 | PostgreSQL | MapStruct | Lombok_

item.name: Get all authors of a book
